scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c -f umd -n stackable -o build/stackable-bundle.js -- js/index.js && mkdir -p public/stackable-out && cp build/stackable-bundle.js public/stackable-out/stackable-bundle.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/stackable.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/stackable-bundle.js && cp build/stackable-bundle.js public/stackable-out/stackable-bundle.js
